headline: Danaher Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.27 per share of its common stock, payable on January 31, 2025 to holders of record on December 27, 2024.

headline: Here's Why You Should Avoid Investing in Danaher Stock Right Now

headline: Danaher: A Resilient And Solid Company With Growth Potential
